text: lst -ayha alrswl- masyuwlana ean tawfiq alkafirin llhdayt, wlkn allah yashrah sudur man yasha' ldynh, wayuafiquh lh. wama tbdhlu min maal yaeud ealaykum nafeuh min allh, walmuminun la yunfiqun 'iilaa tlbana lmrdat allh. wama tunfiquu min maal -mkhlsyn llh- tuufuu thwabh, wala tunqasuu shayyana min dhalik. wafi alayat 'iithbat sifat alwajh lilah taealaa ealaa ma ylyq bih sbhanh
